PropertyList.title: Helicoptere Piasecki HUP

key.name: s
key.desc: Start Engines and Rotor Gear ON
Shutdown Engines and Electric power OFF

PropertyList.name: k
PropertyList.text:
That Helicopter is loaded with: Engines and Rotor Gear OFF Rotor Brake ON Brake-Parking ON (the Left door is opened) Blades Folded
START and STOP ROUTINE To start:
1 Deploy the blades => key "f" (not yet)) 2 Rotor Brake OFF => key "k", (toggle) 3 rotor clutch ON key "j" (toggle) 4 Start the engine => key "}" thrice and "s" 5 Brake-Parking OFF => key "B" optionnal (the pilot door will close)
BTW: You may want the "Easy START" within the menu "HUP-Retriever"
To stop: engine OFF => key "{" thrice ( magnetos = 0 ) rotor clutch => OFF key "j" (toggle)
CRASH DETECTION There is a low level crash detection, with rotor blade removed (broken). You may want to reset it => key "ctrl-f" ON at least 10 seconds
